conclusion: The particle starts at x = 5 m at t = 0.
The velocity at t = 0 is 2 m/s in the positive direction.
The velocity-time graph shows the velocity of the particle as a function of time.
The particle moves in a straight line from x = 5 m at t = 0 to x = 5 m at t = 8.
The position on the x-axis remains constant at x = 5 m throughout the time interval.
The position of the particle at t = 8 s is x = 5 m.
